info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:03PM CDT until June 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN OLDHAM...NORTHWESTERN POTTER...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAM... WESTERN MOORE AND HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 603 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Hartley, or 16 miles south of Dalhart, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Hartley, Channing, Boys Ranch and Romero. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
